title: are there any pans to get Yasuos E under control?
body: His E has a ridiculously stupid CD.  0.01 for a dash is highly unbalanced. sure it has a condition added to it but its a condition hats easily met. making any champ with a skill shot or a delayed effect useless to even try to use. its been creating a toxic environment in the games ive seen making it either ban yas or hear people bitch about him in game

replies.body: I just drop some rocks on the ground with taliyah and watch as Yasuo suicides.
His dash is the essential ability Yasuo has to outplay his opponent. Yes, the ability has a short cooldown, but the short cooldown is needed to limit the harass potential of other enemy mid laners.
He has two other tools for that. In fact, all those tools are so powerful that Riot needed to make his MR flat to give enemy midlaners ANY harass potential.

If by two other tools you are referring to the passive shield that procs with any damage (the easiest being a ranged auto attack) and his windwall with a 26s cooldown level 1, which most people don't get on Yasuo until level 3, then yes, Yasuo does have two other tools. But if one is smart, the proper way to play around them is click Yasuo to auto him, which procs the shield. Wait out the shield (which lasts for one second), and bait out the wall, which has an insanely long cooldown. It takes a bit for yasuo to regain his passive, and with his long cooldown on his w, the yasuo dash is his only other option to avoid getting ridiculously poked down in lane.
There might be some plans to nerf it, idk about pans though ...
You won't see any changes to his E: his entire kit is designed around his E being exactly the way it is. Yasuo's entire concept is centered around extremely high but conditional mobility.
The only ability in his kit that has minimal counterplay is his w. All his other abilities are fine.

There likely aren't any plans to nerf Yasuo's E, no. He's sitting at a decent level of balance. Anything and everything impactful in the game will generate frustration, no champion is immune from this unless they're a walking potato. Just because he does a lot doesn't make him imbalanced.
To be honest, his constant dashing in lane tilts me way too much, even though most of my main champs counter the little sh*t I still have to deal with how annoying he is to play against.

I sometimes like it when he dashes around my minions. Mainly because I make sure they get clumped up so I can just Q him.
